ayah: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
And the earth discharges its burdens[1962]
And man says,[1963] "What is [wrong] with it?" -
That Day, it will report its news
Because your Lord has inspired [i.e., commanded] it.
That Day, the people will depart[1964] separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
footnotes: [1964] From the place of Judgement to their final abode. Another interpretation is "emerge separately" (from the graves) .

ayah: So whoever does an atom's weight[1965] of good will see it,
footnotes: [1965] Or "the weight of a small ant."

ayah: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
